sub_title: MBA | International Business | E-commerce | Data Analysis | Digital Transformation |
summary:
- A positive and proactive professional with over 10 years international working and entrepreneurial experience. Passionate about bridging technology and business for value creation.
- Educated in China, USA, Brazil and Europe, equipped with solid business knowledge and hands-on experience in international business development, marketing & sales, data science, E-commerce, and supply chain management.
- Proficient in Excel, SQL, R, Python, Power BI, and a wide range of AI tools.
- Strong networking, communication, negotiation, and deal-closing skills.
- Friendly and resilient, always willing to help.

Contact information is available upon request. Business and professional opportunities are welcome!

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for buidling and leading a team to steer the company's new business development and new production introduction by minig and analyzing data on Amazon US and Europe. Key responsibilities include:

Team management 
· Participate in the hiring and training of team members to establish the data team. 
· Establish the departmental SOP, introduce a project management platform, and set up a knowledge sharing system.

Data mining and analysis
· Collaborate with the management team to devise a data-driven strategy and translate the business goals into quantitative metrics by mathemetical modeling.
· Use multiple data mining software to collect and clean data; applied analytical models to generate descriptive insights of competitor landscape, product features, customer behavior and journey.
· Present the product investment opportunities in weekly reports using Excel, PPT, and Power BI.

Digital Innovation
· Collaborate with external experts to explore machine learning algorithms in Python and R to develop predictive models for market forcast. 
· Introduce AI tools to automate processes, improve team collaboration and content creation.
profile_positions.title: Manager of Data Mining and Analysis

company.name: University of Amsterdam - Amsterdam Business School

profile_positions.company: University of Amsterdam - Amsterdam Business School
profile_positions.title: MBA Student

profile_positions.description:
TS-Biotech is a fast-growing medium-size Chinese company specialized in developing and producing natural ingredients by biotechnology  for cosmetics, nutrition, and healthcare sectors. I worked in China and travelled overseas on a frequent basis to develop business opportunities.

- Worked closely with the CEO to design international business development strategy and sales materials from scratch. 
- Leveraged limited budget to identify and reach out to international prospects through Linkedin, email, cold calls, exhibitions, and referrals; built up an international distribution network covering 11 countries in four regions: NAFTA (US, Canda), EMEA (Italy, Russia, South Africa), APAC (Korea, Japan, Thailand, Vietnam) and LATAM (Brazil, Colombia). 
- Regularly travelled to visit the international distributors and customers. Listened to their pain points, deep-dived unmet demands, collected market information, trained the distributors product knowledge and sales skills to help them close deals.
- Achieved a breakthrough from 0 to 1 in the US, Thai, Japanese, Vietnamese, Russian, South African, and LATAM markets; successfully established partnerships with 13 active distributors, and initated several projects with key MNC accounts. Increased the revenue from the respoinsible regions from 0 to 40% of the company’s total international sales in two years.
profile_positions.title: International Business Development Manager

profile_positions.description: My entrepreneurial experience. Established a trading & consulting company specialized in Import & Export, consulting, business travel between China and Brazil. Served 10+ clients from multiple sectors and closed deals over 1,5 million USD.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder & Director

profile_positions.location: Porto Alegre, Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil
profile_positions.description:
- Project management: actively engaged in the company’s transformation strategy from exporting from China to exporting to China in the project “the Best of Brazil”, helping Brazilian customers to sell products to China. Developed key partners such as Alibaba, the Grandbuy Group, the World Food City, etc. for the company. 
- New Business Development: developed a new business for the company to support Chinese companies to enter the Brazilian Market; devised a business plan,  closed deals with clients, recruited and led a team to execute the projects.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Procurement consulting: offered full-chain procurement package from sourcing, supplier verification, quality inspection to logistics to over 50 Brazilian companies. building up connections with 200 Chinese suppliers in the first 3 years.
- Leadership: Helped hire 6 colleagues, directly led 3 of them in different projects. 
- Business Travel: Organized corporate missions for both Chinese and Brazilian clients to attend trade fairs, visit companies, and assist business negotiation. Engaged in over 20 deligations and attened trade shows in various sectors, serving over 200 clients.
profile_positions.title: Consultant
